GSD.product_version: versions from v4.6 to before v5.19.2
GSD.description:
ext4: fix race when reusing xattr blocks

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.19.2 by commit 96fa141fa295ae9428da73c56c9852053b575c04, it was introduced in version v4.6 by commit 82939d7999dfc1f1998c4b1c12e2f19edbdff272. For more details please see the references link.
